description: The auth_token middleware now supports admin_user and admin_password settings. We need to update the example api-paste.ini to include these settings.
title: Update api-paste.ini with new auth_token settings

comments.content: The auth_token middleware now supports admin_user and admin_password settings. We need to update the example api-paste.ini to include these settings.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/4016
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/49eefc85977a81cd34f383884c8fc20eca6e675a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 49eefc85977a81cd34f383884c8fc20eca6e675a
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Feb 10 13:11:04 2012 -0500

    Update api-paste.ini with new auth_token settings.
    
    Update api-paste.ini with new 'admin_user' and 'admin_password' settings
    for the keystone auth_token middleware. By default username and password
    are options commented out.
    
    Fixes LP bug #930310.
    
    Change-Id: I04f91df5641d377d52c9578cade131bce5bfd4a4
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
